title:
NG0403: An NgModule that was used for bootstrapping does not specify which component should be initialized.

一個用於引導的 NgModule 沒有指定應該使用哪個元件進行初始化。
contents:
mode_edit

NG0403: An NgModule that was used for bootstrapping does not specify which component should be initialized. 一個用於引導的 NgModule 沒有指定應該使用哪個元件進行初始化。link

說明link

Descriptionlink

這個錯誤意味著用於引導應用程式的 NgModule 中缺少 Angular 繼續引導時所需的關鍵資訊。

This error means that an NgModule that was used for bootstrapping an application is missing key information for Angular to proceed with the bootstrap process.

當 @NgModule 註解中的 bootstrap 屬性缺失（或是空陣列）並且該 NgModule 類上沒有定義 ngDoBootstrap 生命週期鉤子時，就會發生本錯誤。

The error happens when the NgModule bootstrap property is missing (or is an empty array) in the @NgModule annotation and there is no ngDoBootstrap lifecycle hook defined on that NgModule class.

可以在本指南中找到有關引導過程的更多資訊。

More information about the bootstrapping process can be found in this guide.

以下範例將引發錯誤。

The following examples will trigger the error.

@NgModule({ declarations: [AppComponent], imports: [BrowserModule, AppRoutingModule], providers: [], }) export class AppModule {} // The `AppModule` is used for bootstrapping, but the `@NgModule.bootstrap` field is missing. platformBrowser().bootstrapModule(AppModule); @NgModule({ declarations: [AppComponent], imports: [BrowserModule, AppRoutingModule], providers: [], bootstrap: [], }) export class AppModule {} // The `AppModule` is used for bootstrapping, but the `@NgModule.bootstrap` field contains an empty array. platformBrowser().bootstrapModule(AppModule);

如何排除本錯誤link

Debugging the errorlink

請確保用於引導的 NgModule 設定正確：

Please make sure that the NgModule that is used for bootstrapping is setup correctly:

  • @NgModule 註解中存在 bootstrap 屬性（且包含非空陣列）

    either the bootstrap property exists (and contains a non-empty array) in the @NgModule annotation

  • 或者 NgModule 類中存在 ngDoBootstrap 方法。

    or the ngDoBootstrap method exists on the NgModule class
